mean_cn: n. 牧马骑术表演，竞技者；  v. 竞技
mean_en: an event in which people compete at riding horses and bulls, catching animals with ropes, etc.
short_phrase: ride the horse in the American rodeo
sentence: These cowboys in the rodeo are showing off their horse riding skills.
sentence_trans: 牛仔们在竞技表演中展示他们骑马的本领。
